name: Catch Monsters Together! (Pokemon Coop)
description:
Welcome to the region of Clamonca!

"Catch Monsters Together!" Is a monster collecting game inspired by a classic.

Explore the region of Clamonca home to 143 current monsters. Battle with your favorite monsters, level them up and evolve them. Take on the worlds many challenges, all of this is possible in this RPG with a friend with the couch coop mode or just go it alone.

The game is in development but free. 

I'm open to feedback and I have lot's planned.
